page.title: 11SOUTH PARADE PIER,SOUTHSEA.
page.content: Since 1879 when{South Parade Pier was first opened it has been a popular place for residents and visitors. The pier has been burnt down twice, once in 1904 and again in 1974 when a film called 'Tommy' was being made there. One of its main amenities is the {amusement arcade}with games for all the family. There is a fortune teller and outside there is a{children's {playground}and several shops. There is a{banqueting hall}where shows and dances are held, a{restaurant}and two bars which provide entertainment each evening. There are boat trips and people can fish from the pier. Special events are held and every summer{Miss Southsea}is judged. This year there is another competition called Miss In String to be judged at the pier.
